cu.explanation_en: Setting tracking_area_code to 0 (reserved value) will cause invalid tracking area configuration and mobility management failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 dBm (exceeding valid range) will cause invalid SSB power configuration and synchronization signal transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100 dBm（超出有效範圍）會導致無效的 SSB 功率配置和同步信號傳輸失敗。
